Articles.Content:
Hey guys! Was just looking through some old screenshots I had, and found a picture of a space station that I build back in 0.24 I believe!

It was made in career mode and is probably still my best creation. It look a lot of time, a lot of journeys and some very precise orbital maneuvering to get in place!

It is 99% stock, the only thing I added was some extra struts that you can apply in EVA, but I don't think that is cheating as it was integrated into the unlocking, and I needed to bring them up there too. Ohh, and the clouds of course

After that I took a break from the game, but with the release of 1.0 I have returned, and plan to do a long career mode again, with space stations, rovers and other interplanetary fun!

Please share your space stations if you have any photos of it!
